books.author: by Hillary Clinton
books.description: The first woman nominated for president by a major political party details her campaign, mistakes she made, outside forces that affected the outcome and how she recovered in its aftermath.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Major events and battles during the Revolutionary War are told from the perspectives of George Washington, Benjamin Franklin and others.
books.name: KILLING ENGLAND

books.author: by Katy Tur
books.description: The NBC News correspondent describes her work covering the 2016 campaign of the Republican nominee for president and his behavior toward her.
books.name: UNBELIEVABLE

books.author: by Gucci Mane with Neil Martinez-Belkin
books.description: A memoir by the East Atlanta hip-hop artist, who made a comeback after setbacks that included doing time in a maximum-security federal prison.
books.name: THE AUTOBIOGRAPHY OF GUCCI MANE

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of the movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Jonathan Cahn
books.description: Ancient figures from the Middle East are used to explain the rise and fall of contemporary leaders and events.
books.name: THE PARADIGM

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Kurt Andersen
books.description: The politics and culture of 21st-century America are put in the context of five centuries of historical events and movements, including elements of conspiracy theories, crackpot ideas and hucksterism.
books.name: FANTASYLAND

books.author: by Al Franken
books.description: A memoir by the Democratic senator from Minnesota and former “Saturday Night Live” writer.
books.name: AL FRANKEN, GIANT OF THE SENATE

books.author: by Dan Jones
books.description: A narrative history of a religious order formed after the First Crusade.
books.name: THE TEMPLARS

books.author: by Geoffrey C. Ward
books.description: A companion to the PBS series by Ken Burns and Lynn Novick that looks at the events and the legacy of the war.
books.name: THE VIETNAM WAR

books.author: by Atul Gawande
books.description: The surgeon and New Yorker writer considers how doctors fail patients at the end of life, and how they can do better.
books.name: BEING MORTAL

books.author: by Timothy Snyder
books.description: Twenty lessons from the 20th century about the course of tyranny.
books.name: ON TYRANNY

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON
